snippet.title: Chronicles of Vaeltaja: The Old Tower gameplay
snippet.description:
Gameplay of one of the optional dungeons the Old Tower. Traveling through the Great Forest to reach the Old Tower. This time battling also with Wraiths.
No spoilers.

Graphics and level architecture may change in the final version.

Chronicles of Vaeltaja: In Search of the Great Wanderer is a retro-inspired 2.5D role-playing game that takes you back to the golden era of pc gaming when classics like Dungeon Master, Eye of the Beholder, Ishar and Lands of Lore ruled the world. Stats and skills matter and there are no hand-holding.

Made with RPG Maker MZ and with creative use of premade and custom assets and engine enhancing plugins it aims to be one of the deepest and impressive looking games ever created with RPG Makers.

Release 2023

Music by Eric Matyas
(Balloon Fantasy 2, Of Legends And Fables, Bog Creatures on the Move)
 
Assets used in this project:
Ancient Dungeons Base Pack
Copyright © Celianna

Animations Collection III
Copyright © Degica, Co. LTD
Resource creators: Andy Chen

RPG Maker MV – Essential Set
Copyright © Gotcha Gotcha Games Inc.
Resource creators: Murray Atkinson, Michael Rookard, Archeia, Lunarae

FSM: Woods and Cave Tiles
Copyright © REFMAP
Publisher: Degica, Co. LTD

FSM: Town of Beginnings Tiles
Copyright © REFMAP
Publisher: Degica, Co. LTD

Samurai Japan Castle Tiles
Copyright © Degica, Co. LTD

Tall Sprites
by Wayward (https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index....)

Plugins used in this project:

Mimosa_MouseCursor
by Anthony Padilla/Rosedale Studios

LTN_StatsAndSkillLevels
by LTN Games (https://ltngames.itch.io/)

TurnInPlace
by mjshi

MZ3D
by Cutievirus (https://cutievirus.itch.io/)

JJMENET_CustomParametersPlus
by JJMENET

GabeMZ_EquipRequirements
by Gabriel “Gabe” Nascimento

MOG.TitleSplashScreen
by Moghunter (https://mogplugins.wordpress.com)

VisuStella plugins:
VisuMZ_0_CoreEngine
VisuMZ_1_BattleCore
VisuMZ_1_ElementStatusCore
VisuMZ_1_ItemsEquipsCore
VisuMZ_1_MessageCore
VisuMZ_1_SaveCore
VisuMZ_1_SkillsStatesCore
VisuMZ_1_EventsMoveCore
VisuMZ_2_PartySystem
VisuMZ_4_EventTitleScene
VisuMZ_4_AnimatedPictures
VisuMZ_4_ButtonCmnEvts
by Team VisuStella: Yanfly, Arisu, Olivia, Irina (http://www.yanfly.moe/wiki/Main_Page)
